briefTitle: Efficacy of SENS 401 in Subjects With Severe or Profound Sudden Sensorineural Hearing Loss
officialTitle: A Two-part, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Parallel-group, Efficacy and Safety Study of SENS-401 in Subjects With Severe or Profound Sudden Sensorineural Hearing Loss
summary: Primary objective of the study is to assess the efficacy of SENS-401 on hearing loss in comparison to placebo at the end of the 4-week treatment period

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in Pure Tone Audiometry PTA (dB) (Average of the Hearing Threshold of the 3 Contiguous Most Affected Hearing Frequencies in dB as Identified at Study Entry) From Baseline to the End of Treatment Visit (Day 28 ± 3).
